description: We are looking for a front-end web developer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining the company's website and web applications. The ideal candidate will have experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain the company's website and web applications, write clean and efficient code, collaborate with the team on software design and architecture, troubleshoot and debug issues as they arise
education_requirement: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field
experience: At least 3 years of experience as a front-end developer
